description.p: Mages is an experimental Matrix chat client built with Compose Multiplatform and a Rust core powered by matrix-rust-sdk. The flatpak version has limitations with screen sharing and video cam access, which work better on manual downloads / aur builds.

ul.li: Room list with previews and unread counts
Room and thread timelines (text, media, polls)
End-to-end encryption via matrix-sdk
Spaces browser
Presence and privacy settings

description.p: Note: This is experimental software. Things may break, but encryption is handled by the battle-tested matrix-rust-sdk.
